---
title: "Read-in script for Raw assignee information as it appears in the source text and XML files"
output: html_document
---
```{r}
library(data.table)
```

## Load patent file
Please include the folder path of the file. Ex: setwd("C:/Users/johnsmith/Downloads")
```{r}
setwd("")
data <- read.table(unz("rawassignee.tsv.zip", "rawassignee.tsv"), sep = '\t', header = TRUE)
```
## Print information on the dataset: Number of observations, column variables, data type for each variable, and summary statistics for numerical variables.
```{r}
nrow(data)
summary(data)
```
